settings.title: What do I do if an item is out of stock?
settings.description: Fear not! If an item you desire is out of stock, you'll be able to opt-in to receive a notification when it's back in stock.

settings.title: How are your clothes produced?
settings.description: We are committed to protecting people and the environment. All of our clothes are produced in sustainable factories using sustainable materials.

settings.title: What materials do you use?
settings.description: Depending on the range, we use all sorts of materials. Each product explains what it's made of, but one thing is consistent, all of our materials are sustainably sourced.

settings.title: Can I recycle your clothes?
settings.description: Yes! We'd love you to do this where possible. All of our clothes are made to be recylable.

settings.title: How much is shipping?
settings.description: We have a range of shipping options for you to choose from, whether you're in urgent need of your order or would prefer an eco friendly delivery. Orders over £45 receive free delivery, and free next day delivery over £80.

settings.title: How long does shipping take?
settings.description: This will depend on your preference, however we offer next day delivery through to eco-delivery which takes up to 3 working days.

settings.title: How do I track my order?
settings.description: Once you've placed your order you'll receive and email confirmation with a tracking code and link.

settings.title: Can I exchange my items?
settings.description: Yes! If you'd like to exchange your item please contact us stating the reason and confirming your new choice, at which point we'll initiate the exchange.

settings.title: How do I return my order?
settings.description: If you're not happy with your order you can return it within 30 days of your purchase for a refund. Simply package up your items and use the returns label provided.

settings.title: Can I return a part of my order?
settings.description: Yes of course. Follow the same process as a standard return and mark the relevant items on the returns slip.

settings.title: I've received a faulty item, what do I do?
settings.description: We're sorry to hear this. If you've received a faulty item please contact us immediately with a photo and we'll arrange for a replacement to be sent out.

settings.title: Can I pay in installments?
settings.description: Yes, we offer buy now, pay later and split payments on all orders. Simply select your option at checkout and follow the process.

settings.title: Do you offer student discounts?
settings.description: Students and care staff alike get an extra 15% off their order!

settings.title: How do I claim my free gift?
settings.description: If you've qualified for a free gift this will be presented for you to add to your cart before checkout.
